SummaryEnglish: When Kasumi Toyama was out camping as a child, she heard the rhythm of the "Star Beat" while admiring the starry night sky. This sparkling, heart-pounding sound left a lasting impression on her, and since then, she has constantly been seeking to rediscover that exciting thrill.

1.SummaryEnglish: Kasumi and the rest of Poppin'Party head to the beach for some fun and a seaside performance!

2.SummaryEnglish: The next stage that the five bands aim for ...!

3.TitleEnglish: BanG Dream! Episode of Roselia I: Promise
3.SummaryEnglish:
To reach the stage of “FES.“, Yukina Minato decides to form a band.
Each holding their own convictions, the members of the band come together.
The five girls now begin their journey to the top as Roselia...

This is the story of their “promise” made to each other, from the start of the band to their challenge towards FUTURE WORLD FES!

4.TitleEnglish: BanG Dream! Episode of Roselia II: Song I am.
4.SummaryEnglish:
After overcoming numerous tribulations, the members of Roselia promised to appear on FUTURE WORLD FES.
It is now Autumn...

Through writing the lyrics of "Promise," Lisa has matured.

Watching the change of color in the autumn leaves, Yukina and Sayo expressed their resolve in a picture letter to their future selves.

Driven by the wish to do something for Roselia, Rinko has started to compose a new song.

"The remaining quests are the contest, the tournament, and FUTURE WORLD FES..."
Reflecting on their goals, Ako starts to feel anxious.

What view will the five of them see beyond FUTURE WORLD FES?

5.SummaryEnglish:
This time, 2 new bands will be joining Poppin'Party, Afterglow, Pastel*Palettes, Roselia, and Hello, Happy World! on stage! Morfonica, a symphonic band with a fantastic world view, and RAISE A SUILEN, a rock band declaring to be the best!

What will the 7 bands aim for on the "2nd Stage"?

6.SummaryEnglish: Poppin'Party, Roselia, and RAISE A SUILEN's successful concert at the Budokan has passed. Kasumi and the others, who have left a lingering sound on the stage of their dreams, are approached by a mysterious woman. Their next stage is overseas?! Poppin'Party's music isn't stopping yet!

7.TitleEnglish: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! 5th Anniversary Animation -CiRCLE THANKS PARTY!- #1
7.SummaryEnglish: A two-episode animation commemorating the 5th anniversary of BanG Dream! Girls Band Party!

8.TitleEnglish: BanG Dream! Girls Band Party! 5th Anniversary Animation -CiRCLE THANKS PARTY!- #2

11.TitleEnglish: BanG Dream! Film Live 2nd Stage First Encore: Kizunairo no Ensemble
11.SummaryEnglish: BanG Dream! Film Live 2nd Stage Encore 1

12.TitleEnglish: BanG Dream! Film Live 2nd Stage Second Encore: Kyouen Red x Violet
12.SummaryEnglish: BanG Dream! Film Live 2nd Stage Encore 2

13.TitleEnglish: BanG Dream! Film Live 2nd Stage Third Encore: RASHAPEOPLE!
13.SummaryEnglish: BanG Dream! Film Live 2nd Stage Encore 3

1.SummaryEnglish: One day, as she’s still adjusting to her new high school, Kasumi Toyama discovers a trail of stars that leads her to an old thrift store. Inside, she makes a discovery.

2.SummaryEnglish: Kasumi's heart is set on forming a band, but Arisa wants nothing do with it. In fact, Arisa is so determined to avoid her that she puts the star-shaped guitar up for auction.

3.SummaryEnglish: Kasumi asks Rimi to join her band, but Rimi is reluctant. Meanwhile, Glitter*Green runs into an issue on the way to their show.

4.SummaryEnglish: Kasumi starts staying after school to take guitar lessons from Tae. Meanwhile, Arisa seems to have a problem with all the time they are spending together.

5.SummaryEnglish: Kasumi, Tae, and friends are preparing for their first performance. Are they going to be ready in time?

6.SummaryEnglish: Kasumi begins to struggle in school and enlists Saya's help. Meanwhile, Arisa has been searching for the perfect band name.

7.SummaryEnglish: Kasumi has a tall order in convincing Saya to join Poppin'Party, is she able to do it? Meanwhile, they continue to get ready for the Culture Festival!

8.SummaryEnglish: The Cultural Festival preparations are done, and it is time for it to begin. Meanwhile, Poppin'Party play their first show! How does it go?

9.SummaryEnglish: Saya gets a new drum set and the girls all get jobs at Space! They learn what goes into putting on a live show.

10.SummaryEnglish: Poppin'Party auditions at Space but to play there you must impress the owner. Do they achieve their dream?

11.SummaryEnglish: Kasumi is still struggling to find her voice but the rest of Poppin'Party is there to help pick her up.

12.SummaryEnglish: Poppin'Party gets another chance to play at Space. Will they finally impress the owner?

13.SummaryEnglish: Kasumi finally achieves her dream as Poppin'Party plays at Space's last show. How will they perform?

1.SummaryEnglish: A new school year begins for Kasumi and the rest of Poppin'Party. But the music scene never rests, and neither do the other bands in town!

2.SummaryEnglish: Rokka learns that Asuka's sister is in the band she idolizes. Poppin'Party seizes the opportunity when the vocalist of Roselia offers them the chance to perform with them.

3.SummaryEnglish: Poppin'Party reflects on Yukina's blunt words and decide that improvements are in order. Later, Kasumi and Rokka get to know each other better.

4.SummaryEnglish: Kasumi wants to fly during a performance and Kokoro is determined to help her accomplish this! Nothing can possibly go wrong with this plan, right?

5.SummaryEnglish: Pastel*Palettes are performing at the World Idol Festival! They absolutely, positively cannot afford to mess this one up. No pressure...

6.SummaryEnglish: Rain or shine, the show must go on — even if it's raining when Poppin'Party and Afterglow are performing on an outdoor stage!

7.TitleEnglish: I Won't Cry, I Won't Cry
7.SummaryEnglish: Hina's proposing a double culture festival between two schools? And it just so happens that PoPiPa's first anniversary is coming up, too? What a great idea!

8.SummaryEnglish: Tae wishes to join another band to help an old friend. She has Kasumi's full support, but what will this ultimately mean for Poppin'Party?

9.SummaryEnglish: Things appear to be going well... but when was the last time everything went exactly according to plan?

10.SummaryEnglish: Tae wishes to make amends after the fallout from the culture festival. She has a decision to make, but what will RAISE A SUILEN think?

11.SummaryEnglish: The fate of the band hangs in the balance — but no matter how far apart they may be, Poppin'Party are still Poppin'Party.

12.SummaryEnglish: Poppin'Party has emerged from their crucible stronger than ever. What does the future have in store for the band?

13.SummaryEnglish: Everyone's in high spirits cause It's not over yet! It's time for Poppin'Party's first self-sponsored show at Galaxy alongside the other bands.

3.SummaryEnglish:
ポピパ主催ライブから4ヶ月。楽しい夏休みを経て、季節は秋。
蔵練、バイト、生徒会――いつもの日々を過ごす香澄たちPoppin'Partyは、
ライブハウスGalaxyで、あるポスターを見つける。

一方、運命のバンドメンバーを探す六花の元に、一通の招待状が届いて……

再びはじまるキラキラドキドキなステージ！

みんなと一緒なら、どんな夢だって撃ち抜ける！

1.TitleEnglish: It's the Ultimate Dream, Don't You Think?!
1.SummaryEnglish: It's the Budokan or bust for the upcoming BanG Dream! Girls Band Challenge and CHU2 won't rest until RAISE A SUILEN has the ultimate guitarist!

2.SummaryEnglish: Rokka's anxieties get the better of her. However, the guitarist is about to find out just how persistent CHU2 really is.

3.SummaryEnglish: Only two bands can perform at the Budokan. While CHU2 vows to close the gap between Roselia and RAISE A SUILEN, Rokka must overcome a recent setback.

4.SummaryEnglish: Roselia's in first place, but RAISE A SUILEN plans to rock to the top with a professional music video featuring their brand new song!

5.SummaryEnglish: If RAISE A SUILEN can make a music video, then Poppin'Party can make one too! Only... do Kasumi and the others even know how to make one?

6.SummaryEnglish: CHU2 and Yukina are ready for a throwdown between RAISE A SUILEN and Roselia, but Sayo warns Yukina she's putting Roselia's best interests at risk.

7.SummaryEnglish: While some members of Roselia and RAISE A SUILEN find common ground, Sayo pushes herself harder and harder...

8.TitleEnglish: Should We Be Lounging Around Right Now?
8.SummaryEnglish: What do you do with non-cancellable reservations if you can't make it? Give them to someone else! Looks like the bands are about to go on an unexpected hot springs vacation!

9.SummaryEnglish: Poppin'Party has been busy ever since their music video blew up online. They may actually have a real shot in the rankings now!

10.SummaryEnglish: RAISE A SUILEN is coming apart at the seams. LAYER, MASKING and LOCK find encouragement and direction, but what about CHU2 and PAREO...?

11.SummaryEnglish: Who is PAREO, really? Is she even real? A quiet girl called Reona has the answers, and RAISE A SUILEN may not like what she has to say.

12.SummaryEnglish: The voting results are unprecedented! The judges' decision guarantees that the Budokan finals will be a concert to remember!

13.TitleEnglish: This... This Right Here is the Girl Band Generation!
13.SummaryEnglish: It's been a long road, but the grand finale of the BanG Dream! Girls Band Challenge finally takes place on the Budokan stage. Which band will emerge victorious?
